b.	
Personal Accident Cover:
	
	
In the event an insured peril that caused damages 
to Your Home Building and/or Home Contents also 
results in the unfortunate death of either You or Your 
spouse, We will pay compensation of ` 5,00,000 
(Rupees Five Lakh) per person.
